name: Sole Food
description:
Sole Food is a point and click game about self-realization, where the player begins with the most limited view of the world. All you can see are the feet of your character as they engage with the feet of others. As the game progresses, your worldview begins to expand - escalating the possibilities for interaction within the environment.

This game was made during the 2018 SA Game Jam by Benjamin Crooks, Laura Seal and Andrea Hayes. It won the diversity and the narrative prizes. This game is still a prototype! We are aware that there are a few bugs.
